name: FSF Common Ship Blueprint
desc: Allow the production of common FSF ships.

name: FSF Rare Ship Blueprint
desc: Allow the production of rare FSF ships.

name: FSF Small Weapon Blueprint
desc: Allow the production of common weapons of FSF.

name: FSF Large Weapon Blueprint
desc: Allow the production of some powerful weapons of FSF.

name: S-1 Cruise Missile
desc:
The S-series cruise missiles are remote-controlled, frigate-sized, campaign-level weapons. After launch, they search for the nearest hostile fleet within 60 degrees of their heading.

The S-1 warhead contains a massive amount of fragments that are heated into a plasmoid before being dispersed over a wide area, effectively melting enemy armor across an extensive range.

name: S-2 Cruise Missile
desc:
The S-series cruise missiles are remote-controlled, frigate-sized, campaign-level weapons. After launch, they will search for the closest hostile fleet within a 60-degree arc of their heading.

The S-2 warhead contains a shaped charge that focuses all its power on a single point. It is adept at using high speed to penetrate enemy fleet defenses, allowing for pinpoint destruction of selected targets.
